  </style>
 </head>

                Hosted Private Cloud

                 <svg fill="currentColor" id="Layer_1" style="enable-background:new 0 0 20 20;" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 20 20" x="0px" xml:space="preserve" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" y="0px">
                  <polygon points="10.5,5.1 9.8,5.9 13.8,9.5 4.1,9.5 4.1,10.5 13.8,10.5 9.8,14.1 10.5,14.9 15.9,10 ">
                  </polygon>
                 </svg>
                </span>
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <div class="subnav-item" itemprop="name" role="menuitem">
              <a alt="Ceph Object Storage" aria-label="Ceph Object Storage" data-action="int-link" data-click="nav-link" data-location="globalnav-parent-fourth" data-property="mktg" href="/cloud/private/object-storage" itemprop="url">

        <li class="nav-item imh-comment">
         <a alt="Live Chat" aria-label="Live Chat" class="nav-link chat-btn-header chat-icon" data-prodvalue="business-hosting" data-value="sales" href="#" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">

            <g>
             <path d="M1,1.1v13h5v4.7l4.7-4.7H19v-13H1z M18,13.1h-7.7L7,16.4v-3.3H2v-11h16V13.1z">
             </path>
             <circle cx="10" cy="8.1" r="1">
             </circle>

          <span class="subnav-title mobile">
           Start a Live Chat
          </span>
         </a>
        </li>
        <li class="nav-item phone-mobile" itemprop="name" role="menuitem">
         <a alt="Call" aria-label="Phone Number" class="nav-link" data-action="ext-link" data-click="phone" data-location="globalnav-parent-seventh" data-property="mktg" href="tel:888-321-4678" id="phoneMobile" itemprop="url" role="button">

     <div class="uk-width-1-1 uk-text-center uk-padding-small uk-padding-remove-top">
      <h2>

     </div>
     <div class="hosting-features uk-padding uk-padding-remove-left uk-padding-remove-right" uk-grid="">

       <h3 class="included-all-plans-heading uk-text-center uk-text-left@s">

       </h3>
       <p class="tooltips-page-icon uk-text-center uk-text-left@s">

      </div>
      <div class="uk-width-1-2 uk-width-1-3@s uk-text-center uk-text-left@s">
       <img alt="backbone" src="images/tech-backbone.svg" title="Server Icon Illustration" uk-svg=""/>
       <h3 class="included-all-plans-heading uk-text-center uk-text-left@s">
        Your Technology Backbone
       </h3>
       <p class="tooltips-page-icon uk-text-center uk-text-left@s">
        Host your apps, build custom stacks, and choose your OS.
       </p>
      </div>
      <div class="uk-width-1-2 uk-width-1-3@s uk-text-center uk-text-left@s">
       <img alt="experts" src="images/performance-experts.svg" title="Web Hosting Experts Icon Illustration" uk-svg=""/>
       <h3 class="included-all-plans-heading uk-text-center uk-text-left@s">
        Led by Experts
       </h3>
       <p class="tooltips-page-icon uk-text-center uk-text-left@s">
        Experts track your performance, speed, and visitor experiences.
       </p>

      <div class="uk-width-1-2 uk-width-1-3@s uk-text-center uk-text-left@s">

        Always Safe &amp; Secure
       </h3>
       <p class="tooltips-page-icon uk-text-center uk-text-left@s">

       </p>

   <section class="home-faqs uk-padding">
    <h2>
     Web Hosting FAQs
    </h2>
    <ul uk-accordion="">
     <li itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question">
      <a class="uk-accordion-title" href="#">
       <div>
        <h3 itemprop="name">
         What is web hosting?
        </h3>
       </div>
      </a>
      <div aria-hidden="true" class="uk-accordion-content" hidden="" itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
       <div itemprop="text">
        <p>
         Web hosting or a web hosting provider, gives you space (your hosting plan), for your data (your email/website), on a server. Our web hosting servers are completely maintained, operated and owned by us. However, all of your data located on our servers belongs to you.
        </p>
        <p>
         We offer many web hosting plans, including WordPress site hosting,
         <a href="/vps-hosting">
          virtual private server (VPS)
         </a>
         web hosting, dedicated servers, cloud hosting and shared web hosting. Based on your hosting plan we also offer free SSL certificates, 99.99% uptime, WebPro control panel and hosting for eCommerce online stores.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question">
      <a class="uk-accordion-title" href="#">
       <div>
        <h3 itemprop="name">
         What is Shared web hosting?
        </h3>
       </div>
      </a>
      <div aria-hidden="true" class="uk-accordion-content" hidden="" itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
       <div itemprop="text">
        <p>
         Shared web hosting is a service that provides you with a certain portion of server resources for your data and website.
         <a href="/support/product-guides/business-shared-hosting/what-is-shared-hosting/">
          Shared web hosting
         </a>
         is exactly that - multiple website domains hosted on the same server, sharing resources.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question">
      <a class="uk-accordion-title" href="#">
       <div>
        <h3 itemprop="name">
         How do I switch web hosting providers?
        </h3>
       </div>
      </a>
      <div aria-hidden="true" class="uk-accordion-content" hidden="" itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
       <div itemprop="text">
        <p>
         Web hosting migration and
         <a href="/support/website/migrate-website-from-another-host/">
          website migration from a different hosting provider
         </a>
         is offered at no charge based on the web hosting plan you have selected.
         <a href="/launch-assist">
          Launch Assist
         </a>
         , our website migration service program, can transfer all of your files and databases to your new InMotion Hosting account. You can request a Launch Assist website migration after signing up for your hosting plan and
         <a href="/support/website/ensure-successful-website-transfer/">
          ensure a successful website transfer
         </a>
         .
        </p>
        <p>
         Your data, website, and databases will have a seamless transition with zero downtime. If you are a web guru, you can also
         <a href="/support/website/perform-your-own-website-transfer/">
          migrate your website to your new hosting plan
         </a>
         without any assistance.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question">
      <a class="uk-accordion-title" href="#">
       <div>
        <h3 itemprop="name">
         How does the web hosting money-back guarantee work if I have prepaid for a year or more?
        </h3>
       </div>
      </a>
      <div aria-hidden="true" class="uk-accordion-content" hidden="" itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
       <div itemprop="text">
        <p>
         We provide a
         <a href="/meet-us/guarantee">
          full money-back guarantee
         </a>
         on all web hosting plans, from 30 to 90 days depending on your purchase.
        </p>
        <p>
         In the event, you prepaid yearly your refund will be prorated based on usage. We want to give you the best experience, no matter if you’re coming to or leaving InMotion Hosting. Unfortunately, there are no refunds for addons or Remote KVMs.
        </p>
        <p>
         You can read all about our guarantee in our
         <a href="/terms-of-service">
          terms of service
         </a>
         .
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question">
      <a class="uk-accordion-title" href="#">
       <div>
        <h3 itemprop="name">
         Does WordPress require web hosting?
        </h3>
       </div>
      </a>
      <div aria-hidden="true" class="uk-accordion-content" hidden="" itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
       <div itemprop="text">
        <p>
         Yes. WordPress does require website hosting however, you do have several choices. The first step is to
         <a href="/domains">
          purchase a domain name
         </a>
         or own an existing domain name. The next step is to get a web hosting account.
        </p>
        <p>
         WordPress can be hosted with any hosting provider or WordPress.com. WordPress.org is the website in which you download the WordPress self-hosted content management system (CMS) files to begin creating your website. For more information visit our blog article about
         <a href="/blog/determining-what-kind-of-hosting-plan-you-need-for-your-business-website/">
          WordPress Web hosting
         </a>
         .
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
    </ul>
   </section>
   <div class="uk-section uk-padding-remove-top uk-remove-padding-bottom imh-need-help-section">
    <div class="uk-container-fluid">
     <div class="footer-cover uk-background-cover uk-height-large uk-panel imh-panel uk-flex uk-flex-center uk-flex-middle uk-flex-left" style="background: url(images/imh-opacity.png) repeat, url(images/footer-cover.jpg) no-repeat center center; background-size: cover;">
      <div class="uk-flex uk-flex-center uk-flex-middle uk-height-small uk-padding-small" uk-grid="">
       <div class="uk-width-1-1 uk-width-auto@s imh-cx-block">
        <p class="h2">
         Need Help Deciding? We're Here For You.
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="uk-width-1-1 uk-width-auto@s uk-text-center">
        <div class="uk-visible-toggle imh-button">
         <a aria-label="Chat" class="btn-primary chat-open chat-btn-popup" data-prodvalue="business-hosting" data-value="sales">
          <span class="imh-icon" uk-icon="icon: commenting">
          </span>
          Chat With Us
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div role="contentinfo">
   <div class="uk-container uk-padding">
    <div class="uk-grid-column-large uk-grid-row-large uk-child-width-1-4 uk-padding uk-visible@m imh-footer" uk-grid="">
     <div>
      <span class="footer-main-heading">
       Products
      </span>
      <ul class="uk-list imh-list uk-link-text" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/SiteNavigationElement" role="menu">
       <li itemprop="name" role="menuitem">
        <a href="/shared-hosting" itemprop="url">
         Shared Hosting
        </a>
       </li>
       <li itemprop="name" role="menuitem">
        <a href="/wordpress-hosting" itemprop="url">
         WordPress Hosting
        </a>
       </li>
       <li itemprop="name" role="menuitem">
        <a href="/managed-vps-hosting" itemprop="url">
         Managed VPS
        </a>
       </li>
       <li itemprop="name" role="menuitem">
        <a href="/cloud-vps" itemprop="url">
         Cloud VPS
        </a>
       </li>
       <li itemprop="name" role="menuitem">
        <a href="/dedicated-servers" itemprop="url">
         Managed Dedicated Servers
